scripts.//: Note, the sed calls in 'build' and 'start' are to work around https://github.com/purescript-contrib/purescript-affjax/issues/161
scripts.build: spago bundle-app --to sofa.js && sed -i 's/&& module.require /\&\& false /' sofa.js && parcel build sofa.html
scripts.docker-build: yarn build && docker build -f docker/Dockerfile -t sofa:latest .
scripts.start: sed -i 's/&& module.require /\&\& false /' ./output/Affjax/foreign.js && parcel serve sofa-dev.html
